front.title:
Use of Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) and Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) for Conference Floor Control
Protocol (SOAP) for Conference Floor Control

abstract.t: During a conference, floor control coordinates simultaneous access to shared resource in multimedia conferences. Floor control allows applications and users to gain safe and mutually exclusive or non- exclusive access to the shared resources. This document defines an approach of using Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) event notification mechanism and Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) to perform floor control.
